docs.title: NVF2 Software
docs.text:
This repository holds all the modules used to run the NVF2 software.

This project is used in conjection with NVFSW-PIO, as one of its libraries.

* This project is still a work in progress.

docs.title: Content
docs.text:
The library is organised by:

  • Board (and common)
  • Packages
  • Apps
  • Hardware Abstraction

The Apps and Packages in folders categorised by Board is Board specific, those outside a Board folder is common to all boards.

docs.title: Package
docs.text: Or as represented by "pkg" shorthand, is defined as the "main" function of the board. This will consists of 1 or more apps. These apps will be like a module that is included in the pkg.

docs.title: App
docs.text: Or as represented by "app" shorthand, is defined as 1 feature running on the board. This app will consist of 1 or more hardware abstracton. The hardware layer protocols (ie. canbus) is abstracted to hardware abstracton and features that uses canbus to send and receive data (ie. R2D) is performed in App, rather than at a higher level, Pkg or repeating the nuances of low level hardware functions abstracted by hardware abstraction.

docs.title: Hardware Abstraction
docs.text: Does not have a prefix. its name is the peripheral. These abstractions will take care of low level or direct handling with stm32 HAL to provide a simpler API for Apps or packages to use peripherals without repeating the setups and bother about monitoring the hardware.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
